ygData.subject: RE: Btw, has anyone noticed Pixie Strike now works?
ygData.msgSnippet: Perhaps the song is more useful.  I was Pixie Striking Sonic Bats and Lava Beetles in Sol B last night and I thought it seemed like I was having a pretty good
ygData.messageBody:
Perhaps the song is more useful. I was Pixie Striking Sonic Bats and Lava
Beetles in Sol B last night and I thought it seemed like I was having a
pretty good run of luck. I definitely *do* remember its giving me the
message and the bats hitting me soon after, but maybe that was just an
ordinary short stun. Man it feels good to stun those bats for a change.

As an aside, I was grouped with a very nice 50th level Necromancer named
Cryonax last night. Cryonax was the 2nd person to hit level 50 Fennin Ro -
and he still plays just for fun. He said the first level 50 was Bohdidarma
(sp?) - a monk!

Crier Sharpsong - 40th song Bard on Fennin Ro

> From: <kim@...>
>
> If you use it on yourself, it's either resist or stun. It
> seems to be more effective against mobs as well, although it's
> resisted more now that they added the MR debuff to it (or
> maybe all the mobs I've been fighting lately have MR buffs).
> There are still cases of the song seemingly not working, but
> they are not frequent enough for me to consider the song less
> than useless.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
